translations.4335429152513086741: I am 22 years old and a Programmer Analyst at {$START_LINK}WriteSys Traffic Systems{$CLOSE_LINK}, where I am a {$START_BOLD_TEXT} full-stack developer {$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} and work with C# + .NET, TypeScript + Angular e SQL. I am also in my last semester of a Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering. {$LINE_BREAK}{$LINE_BREAK} I have always been {$START_BOLD_TEXT}passionate about technology{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} and naturally curious, always willing to learn more and explore new innovations and trends. Within this passion, my affinity for programming stands out, especially with the C# language and the .NET framework, with which I have experience developing Web and Desktop applications. As an example, {$START_BOLD_TEXT}I worked on the development of a complete web system for managing inventory, products, employees, and orders {$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}. This open-source application, available on {$START_LINK_1}GitHub{$CLOSE_LINK}, was built with {$START_BOLD_TEXT} REST APIs in C# + ASP.NET and SQL Server on the back-end {$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}, and a {$START_BOLD_TEXT} responsive front-end in TypeScript + React and Bootstrap {$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}. {$LINE_BREAK}{$LINE_BREAK} As a hobby, I am also interested in 3D, both 3D art (especially using Blender) and 3D printing; both of which I have experience with.
translations.1860371845951744092: Advanced proficiency in programming languages: {$START_BOLD_TEXT}C#, C, Python, Java etc.{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}.
translations.1935993873828933395: Experience in web development: {$START_BOLD_TEXT}HTML, CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}, with and without frameworks like {$START_BOLD_TEXT}React, Bootstrap and Angular{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}.
translations.2912446148888670409: Skilled in developing and consuming {$START_BOLD_TEXT}REST APIs{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}, with a focus on the {$START_BOLD_TEXT}ASP.NET{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} framework.
translations.3831649619795159277: Practical knowledge of {$START_BOLD_TEXT}SQL{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} and RDBs: {$START_BOLD_TEXT} SQL Server, Oracle DB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite.{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}
translations.7237761525174257303: Extensive practical experience in {$START_BOLD_TEXT}hardware{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} and {$START_BOLD_TEXT}firmware{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} development for {$START_BOLD_TEXT} embedded systems {$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}, with emphasis on the use of the {$START_BOLD_TEXT}Arduino{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} platform and {$START_BOLD_TEXT} C++ programming{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}.
translations.1790030726646664982: Solid understanding and experience in {$START_BOLD_TEXT} Software Engineering, good development practices {$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}, and version control with {$START_BOLD_TEXT}Git{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} and GitHub.
translations.7250227411549917578: In-depth mastery of {$START_BOLD_TEXT} IT, operating systems, computer networks, and hardware{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}.
translations.6304224829913696412: This personal website is where you can find my info and some of {$START_LINK}my projects{$CLOSE_LINK} (related to software, harware and engineering), and see some of the {$START_LINK_1}artwork{$CLOSE_LINK} of questionable quality I've created in my spare time. Here you can also find links to my socials and see my contact info. {$START_BOLD_TEXT} Feel free to follow me around and reach out {$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT} if you have any questions, opportunities or inquiries, both personal and professional. {$LINE_BREAK}{$LINE_BREAK} The website was built from scratch by me, using {$START_LINK_2}Angular v20{$CLOSE_LINK}, {$START_LINK_3}TypeScript{$CLOSE_LINK} and {$START_LINK_4}Sass (SCSS){$CLOSE_LINK}. For some of the components and theming, I used {$START_LINK_5}Angular Material{$CLOSE_LINK}. For internalization and localization I am using {$START_LINK_6}Transloco{$CLOSE_LINK}. The source code of the website is on {$START_LINK_7}GitHub{$CLOSE_LINK}. {$START_BOLD_TEXT} Feel free to make suggestions and contributions{$CLOSE_BOLD_TEXT}, or fork the repository to use as a template, just {$START_UNDERLINED_TEXT} please credit me with the proper attribution {$CLOSE_UNDERLINED_TEXT} if you do that.
